==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here. -->
Truand is a Fontainian man working with [[Confrerie of Cabriere]] as an enforcer. He's tasked by [[Marcel (Fontaine)|someone]] to collect some debts, as seen by harassing [[Estelle]]. It is later revealed that said debts are used to task the [[Gardemek]] army to kill [[Navia]], daughter of Spina di Rosula's president [[Callas]].
